entities.name: protego
entities.description: A spell that creates an invisible shield. ("Protego! she cried, and an invisible shield expanded between her and Harry on the one side and Ron on the other;")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: One of the main characters in the story. ("Harry felt a corrosive hatred toward Ron: Something had broken between them.")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of the main characters in the story. ("Harry felt a corrosive hatred toward Ron: Something had broken between them.")

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: An object that is being referred to as something that Harry wants Ron to leave behind. ("Leave the Horcrux," Harry said.)

relationships.description: Harry feels a corrosive hatred toward Ron. ("Harry felt a corrosive hatred toward Ron: Something had broken between them.")
The Protego spell protects Harry from something. ("Protego! she cried, and an invisible shield expanded between her and Harry on the one side and Ron on the other;")
